name: Dillons Aviation Inc - Greenville
about: Dillon's Aviation, Inc., located in Greenville, North Carolina, is a comprehensive aviation service provider. We offer both Part 61 and Part 141 FAA flight training programs, catering to students seeking private pilot certificates, commercial pilot certificates, and flight instructor certifications. In addition to flight training, our services include aerial photography, aircraft ferrying, aircraft maintenance, rental, and storage. We also provide pilot supplies and charter flights. With a commitment to excellence, Dillon's Aviation sets a new standard in flight training, ensuring a professional and supportive environment for all our students. Experience the best in aviation education with Dillon's Aviation.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
